name: Succulent Sake Favor
description: Decorate your next event with a nice little Rosette Succulents favor. Paired with a decorative sake cup, this favor blends the two in a perfect take home arrangement. Sake cup measures 1.75 H x 1.75 D. Add a wooden stick with a flag to create an instant personalized favor for your wedding or event.

name: Succulent Rosette - Echeveria Perle
description: This succulent features bold powerful foliage. The sweeping wide leaves attract attention while the purple tones give a soft subtle feel. Succulent arrives in a 4 inch growers pot ready for potting.

name: Zebra Cactus (Haworthia fasciata)
description: Small and slow growing, Haworthia fasciata are commonly known as Zebra Cactus due to the tubercles that grow on the back of its leaves in a stripey pattern. Closely resembles its cousin, Haworthia attenuata, Haworthia fasciata is smoother on the inside of its leaves. Arrives in a 4 inch growers pot ready for potting.

name: Succulent Rosette - Imbricata
description: One of our bolder varieties of the Echeveria, this succulent is most notable for its bright green color. It makes a large impact in a terrarium or centered in an arrangement. Succulent arrives in a 4 inch growers pot ready for potting.

name: Succulent - Sedum Ogon
description: Another one of our favorite ground base cover succulents. The foliage resembles little round petals which makes them perfect for complimenting rosettes. The color is a mixture of yellows and greens which makes it ideal for blending multiple varieties of succulents. Succulent arrives in a 4 inch growers pot ready for potting.
